name: Ca'Fa'rd
description:
Ca'Fa'rd WIP

Ca'Fa'rd is a Rythm Game where you are a Cockroach running away from it natural ennemies, the insect killer and his poisonous gas.

This game was created by 4 people in 2.5 month during a school projet.

(we're still halfway through production)

Developper and Game Designer :
